pages.text: Some changes to the Create mod have been made. They are...

pages.title: Renames
pages.text: Mechanical Mixer>Mechanical Whisk$(br)Brass Sheet>Brass Plate$(br)Fluid Tank>Fluid Vessel$(br)Fluid Pipe>Copper Fluid Pipe$(br)Toolbox>Strongbox$(br)Limestone>Marble$(br)Blaze Burner>Blazing Burner

pages.title: Press Changes
pages.text: The Mechanical Press is no longer used on its own. It is still used for Automated Packing and Compacting recipes. To make plates, use the $(l:tools/e_tools)Engineer's Hammer$().

pages.title: Mechanical Saw Changes
pages.text: The Mechanical Saw no longer creates extra planks. The $(l:electric_machines/sawmill)sawmill$() from IE continues to, though.

The Blazing Burner (formerly Blaze Burner) no longer requires catching a Blaze to obtain (although this method is still possible). Additionally, the recipe for Blazing Fuel (formerly Blaze Cake) has changed.
